contents: Empress Elizabeth of Austria's favorite sculpture at her villa Achilleion was a depiction of the poet Heinrich Heine, according to Karl Küchler.
In 2023, Melbourne's Monash Gallery of Art rebranded to become the Museum of Australian Photography.
Scott Wilson discovered the iconic "Lucy in the Field with Flowers" skin for a MOBA game on the curb between two trash cans.
In 1810, François Aimé Louis Dumoulin published a collection of 150 engravings illustrating the journey of "Robinson Crusoe."

The Society of Illustrators' first "Annual Exhibition" featured 350 original artworks.
